attributes.action: trade with the eu but make our own laws
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the government want about five more countries to join the eu this will mean 
millions more people given the right to
enter the uk we are the most populated 
country in the eu by size should we just trade with them and make our own laws

rejection.details: There are already a number of petitions on the system pertaining to UK withdrawal from the EU, or part of it. Please search the site and choose one to sign.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
